actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to allow the Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia to retain the marshal in office on the date of enactment of the Federal Courts Improvement Act of 1982.

summary.text: Authorizes the Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia to retain in office marshals serving in such capacity under specified law on the date of enactment of the Federal Courts Improvement Act of 1982.

titles.title: A bill to allow the Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia to retain the marshal in office on the date of enactment of the Federal Courts Improvement Act of 1982.
